nodes.text: The Bitrose sector was located on the far edge of the Outer Rim, bordering the Gaulus, Hunnoverrs and Instrop sectors, as well as the Wild Space. It contained the planets Roost and Stoga. The planet Naos III was located near this sector within Wild Space.
During the Galactic Civil War, the region was terrorized by insane Dark Jedi Danaan Kerr.
